name: Halloween Tower
description:
INSTRUCTIONS

WASD to Move

Mouse to Aim and Shoot

Space to Dash

U to Open Skill Menu 

Story

On a cold and eerie Halloween night, an otherworldly tower emerges from the ground. Spanning up to the sky, the tower casts a large shadow over the denizens below.

"Such a hallow night, makes perfect for world domination", a sinister voice loom. As the voice starts to laugh menacingly, monsters start to rush out the tower. Havoc spreads from town to town and fear begins clouding the world. 

But in amidst of the chaos, stood forth four brave souls who are willing to challenge this tower and conquer this dreadful night. 

Upcoming Previews/Concept Arts From left to right: Jiangshi, Rogue, Frankenstein Monster, Vampire Hunter
